biotools.summary: ENQUIRE (Expanding Networks by Querying Unexpectedly Inter-Related Entities) offers an alternative to manual literature curation and database mining to study complex biomedical phenomena. ENQUIRE generates a co-occurrence network of genes and biomedical ontologies (MeSH) using a corpus of publications as input. The algorithm iteratively reconstructs and expands the network by generating PubMed queries from significant interrelations, until it obtains an interconnected network of genes and MeSH relevant to the input corpus.
